short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beatopter is a chrome extension that allows users to automate their form entry from an .xml file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Beatopter is a chrome extension that allows users to automate their form entry from an .xml file.
This avoids repetitive, non-value-added data entry, so you can focus your energy and time on the tasks that really matter.
This makes you more efficient, and keeps you focused on the essentials.
Note that this extension does not store any data.
